name: Cgrep
tagline: Cgrep: a context-aware grep for source codes
body:
### Welcome to CGrep HomePage.

> Cgrep is a grep tool suitable for searching in large code repositories. It supports 27 programming languages, and searches that go beyond the mere regex pattern matching. It enables context-aware filtering for all the languages and semantic searches for C/C++.

### Features

* Multithread with a configurable number of jobs. 

* Multi-line, multi-pattern searches.

* Colors hilight for tokens and strings matching.

* Recursive searches with prune directories and language filters.

* Simple, regex and full word-matching searches through a generic code tokenizer.

* Support for context-aware filters for the following languages: Awk, C, Cpp, Csharp, Css, CMake, D, Erlang, Fsharp, Go, Haskell, Html, Java, Javascript, Latex, Make, OCaml, ObjectiveC , Perl, PHP , Python, Ruby, Scala, Tcl, Shell, Verilog, Vim.

* Semantic searches for C/C++ languages.

### Libraries

* In addition to the Haskell platform, the following libraries are required: stringsearch, cmdargs and ansi-terminal
 
### Authors

Nicola Bonelli <nicola.bonelli@gmail.com>
